snippet: Morton A. Pierce, co-chairman of Dewey & LeBoeuf’s mergers and acquisitions group and a member of the firm’s executive committee, is headed to a rival firm.
abstract: Morton A. Pierce, co-chairman of Dewey & LeBoeuf’s mergers and acquisitions group and a member of the firm’s executive committee, is headed to a rival firm.

headline.main: Dewey Deal Lawyer Decamps to White & Case
